bibl.title: Wine Consumption and Usage in Egypt's Monastic Communities (6th-8th Century).
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Gives an overview of the evidence for monastic vineyard ownership and considers other options available to monks seeking to procure wine for their needs. Discusses the various uses of wine in coenobitic monasteries and lavras and addresses the question of the volume of wine consumed by monks. - Avec résumé en anglais.
